trends: There have been no other sightings in Blountstown
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Tear Shaped with a long tail, flashed colors, blue, red, and yellow
divs: Sighting DetailsI have never really believed in UFOs. I was sitting in the backroom of the house smoking a cigarette when I noticed clouds form. I guess I noticed the clouds because I had went threw a tornado months before and I am paranoid of the weather now. Anyway as I was smoking and looking at this cloud form I saw a tear drop looking object fly out from the cloud. It shot out so fast that if I had blinked I would have missed it. It glowed real bright as a light blue color then a dark red then a bright yellow before it was out of my view. It show down behind the tree tops and that was the last I saw of it. I was so shocked at what I saw that I ran into the kitchen and told my dad who I am taking care of. Of coarse he didnt believe me. I walked back into that same room to finish my cigarette that I had layed down in the ask tray. As I was sittiing there looking at the sky and that same cloud I had the creeps and my hair stood on end. I was still freaked out. I was thinking I wish I had my camcorder at that time. Then it had maybe been 5 minutes after I saw the thing that I seen airplanes go by. I remeber thinking that maybe they were looking for that thing I had seen. I didnt give my name because if it got out that I reported this in this town people would run me out. I did give my e-mail if you want to ask me questions. And if you want I will take pictures of the area I seen it fly. Just wanted someone to know because it was on my mind so much. That saying seeing is believeing is true. Now I dont know what to think of life. P.S. I found this site from the History Channle. I am attaching a scetch I did. I am not a good artist.
